org.beancp.MapperConfigurationException

    Package Description
    org.beancp
    Object to object mapping library for Java 8+.

      Adds new mapping defined by map.
      void MappingConvention.build(MappingsInfo mappingInfo, Class sourceClass, Class destinationClass)
      Indicates that mapping configuration is defined, so convention may populate its internal configuration.
      MapperBuilder MapperBuilder.mapAnyByConvention(MappingConvention convention)
      If two data types has no mapping defined by MapperBuilder.addMap(java.lang.Class, java.lang.Class, org.beancp.MapSetup) or any of addConverter methods then this convention will be used.
